contract_description: The Supplier shall provide the following products/services to the Buyer: Product X, Product Y, Product Z.
pricing_and_payment_terms: Product X: $15 per unit, Product Y: $25 per unit, Product Z: $35 per unit. The Buyer shall make payments to the Supplier within 45 days from the receipt of a valid invoice. Payments shall be made via PayPal, as agreed upon by both parties.
termination_clause: Either party may terminate this Contract with 60 days written notice to the other party. Either party may terminate this Contract immediately in the event of a material breach by the other party.
